TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstanceHandleConflictException extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommandException

Docs.summary: A persistence provider throws this exception when it tries to acquire write access to an instance by binding an instance handle to an instance lock, when an instance handle with write access to that instance already exists.
